Ingredient.Name: Russet Potatoes
Ingredient.Notes: One for each persion, and one for the pot.

Method.Step: Slice potatoes about a half inch thick, into a large pot.
Add enough water to cover the potatoes, then enough salt so the water tastes like sea water.
Bring potatoes to a boil, reduce to a medium simmer for about 15 minutes or until potatoes are easiy pierced with a fork.
Drain potatoes. Add to bowl of stand mixer with the cream, butter and pepper.
Mix the potatoes until just smooth and creamy, adding additional cream to achieve the desired consistency.
Server with a pat of butter.

Variations.Variation: Add horseradish when blending for horseradish mashed potatoes.
Add Roasted Garlic for Roasted Garlic mashed potatoes.
Add grated Parmesan Cheese and garnish with fresh basil.
